items.summary: Update the two logo elements in the HomePage section 3 "Brands We Deal In" banner (rendered by frontend/src/components/home/BrandsBanner.tsx) so that: - Element 1 (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) uses src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Siemens_AG_logo.svg" - Element 2 (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/img[1]) uses src="https://www.ruralelec.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/Schneider-Electric-logo-jpg-.png" Apply changes only to these two selected logo elements.
